title: Can I sell my Academic (school) books that have images of living things in them? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: brother has academic books which have some unnecessary pictures of living objects isn't Hal for him to sell those books these books are used by students and they have to buy them and you also at one stage of your life had to buy them so when you sell them you do not sell them for these photographs that are inappropriate or Haram rather for the material in the book and therefore it is there's no problem in selling it inshallah uh
